topics.introduction: Let's talk about your work or studies.
questions: Do you work or are you a student?
What do you do for work? / What are you studying?
Why did you choose this job / field of study?
What do you like most about your work / studies?
Would you like to change your job / field of study in the future?

topics.introduction: Now, let's talk about your hometown.
questions: What do you like about your hometown?
Has your hometown changed much since you were a child?
Would you recommend tourists to visit your hometown?
Do you think you will live in your hometown in the future?

topics.introduction: Let's move on to talk about your daily routine.
questions: What time do you usually wake up?
Do you prefer mornings or evenings?
Has your daily routine changed recently?
What is your favorite part of the day?

cueCard.topic: Describe a memorable trip you have taken
cueCard.conclusion: and explain why this trip was memorable for you.

followUpQuestions: Did you take any photos during this trip?
Would you like to go there again?

part3.introduction: Let's discuss some general questions about travel and tourism.

questions.question: Why do you think people like to travel?
questions.followUp: Has this changed over the years?

questions.question: What are the benefits of traveling to other countries?
Do you think tourism is good for local communities?
How has technology changed the way people travel?
questions.followUp: Is this always a positive thing?

questions.question: Do you think people will travel more or less in the future?
